snippet.title: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2 (PS2 Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2 (PS2) - Characters: Goku vs. Piccolo - Stage: Plains

The game's features include a tournament stage, versus mode, and an item shop. The story mode in the game is known as Dragon Adventure, and plays like a board game as the player assembles a team of Z-fighters to challenge the various enemies in the series starting from the Saiyan Saga up to the final Kid Buu Saga. The game has a total of 31 playable characters including fusions of different fighters, and Majin Buu's various forms.
